meanings.definition: To dress or groom oneself carefully or neatly.
meanings.sent1: She likes to prink before going out.
meanings.sent2: He prinks in front of the mirror every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to prink its fur with a bow.
meanings.sent4: The garden prinked itself with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: Watching her prink made him smile.

meanings.definition: To adorn or decorate oneself in a showy manner.
meanings.sent1: The peacock prinks its feathers to impress.
meanings.sent2: She prinked herself with glitter for the party.
meanings.sent3: The clown prinked his face with bright makeup.
meanings.sent4: The tree prinked its branches with twinkling lights.
meanings.sent5: Her dress was prinked with sparkling jewels.
